title: Looking for Mid and Support ranked 5 team- Bronze to silv!
body:
Hey, serious ranked team here looking for positive players who are looking to learn, grow and make friends as a team.
So far we have a Jungler, Top, Adc. So we are looking for a support and a mid
We enjoy messing around and have banter occasionally. So not for the easily offended
Feel free to add me and lets have a chat to see if you are ready to be a new member.
Thanks Big Chief

IGN- Big Chief Poon

Hit me up an add and private message :)

replies.body: If your still looking for a mid add me ingame (lemmee smash) -s4
Added. The role will be Secondry mid. When our main  isnt on considiring you get the gig.. yo-ull be playing

Hey bro I can play any role.

Add me IGN: Toxic Russian
hey bro i can play support or mid ! :)
hey brother a secondary mid lane needed for when main mid isn't on ill hit you a message!
Secondry Mid laner needed for when main  cant play so yes.
